title: Towards a ‘clicked’ PSMA targeting gene delivery bioconjugate-polyplex for prostate cancer
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,23796-23801
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03640A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Amanda R. Noble, Saeed Akkad, Nicholas D. J. Yates, James M. Jeffries, Nathalie Signoret, Martin A. Fascione
We describe the construction of a prostate specific membrane antigen (PSMA) binding bioconjugate-polyplex, using ‘click’ chemistry, which we demonstrate is capable of targeted delivery of a GFP gene to PSMA overexpressing prostate cancer cells.
